definition: to make fine adjustments or divide into marked intervals for optimal measuring
details:
verb
- to make fine adjustments or divide into marked intervals for optimal measuring
= example: to make fine adjustments or divide into marked intervals for optimal measuring
= synonyms: graduate
- to measure the caliber of
= example: to measure the caliber of
- to mark the scale of a measuring instrument so that it can be read in the desired units
= example: to mark the scale of a measuring instrument so that it can be read in the desired units
